name: Dice Physics
description:
"It's the best dice roller out", "Awesome for an impromptu game of farkle", "The most realistic dice roller on device!", ..
Dice Physics is a dice roller application with beautiful 3D graphics and advanced physics engine.

- Support up to 30 dice with total score
- Rolling the dice and wait for pressing the roll it button
- Lock and release dice by touching (for example for playing dice games like Yahtzee)
- Advanced 3D graphics with dynamic shadows
- Real physics for each dice
- Multi type of dice
- Vibration when roll of dice is finish.
- Automatic zoom on dice when rolled

If you have problems or suggestions, please review.
